alert.note: Alert for Augusta; Central Virginia Blue Ridge; Eastern Highland; Nelson; Western Highland (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 08 at 9:04PM EST until January 09 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of less than one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Augusta, Nelson, and Highland Counties, and Central Virginia Blue Ridge. * WHEN...Until midnight EST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

area.areaDesc: Augusta; Central Virginia Blue Ridge; Eastern Highland; Nelson; Western Highland
